alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 5:16PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Phillips, central Garfield and western Valley Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 516 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Whitewater to 12 miles northeast of Saco to 16 miles northwest of Hell Creek Rec Area. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Tampico, Hinsdale, St. Marie, Vandalia, Thoeny, The Bentonite Plant, Frenchman Reservoir and Whatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley
